document_data.name: Tyrda Q'Helvor
document_data.mainbody: '''Tyrda Q'Helvor''' was Pommarch on the [[Council of Six]] in [[Amn]] from [[1362 DR]], the Lady of [[House Q'Helvor]] from [[1359 DR]], and the first woman on the council.
document_data.History: She was only the head of a moderately successful family of pottery merchants from [[Esmeltaran]] before being chosen by the Iltarch for an empty position in the council.
document_data.Relationships: Very secretly, Tyrda was an able [[wizard]] and [[Rhinnom Dannihyr]], having discovered her secret through the [[Shadow Thieves]], planned to use Tyrda as a secret weapon against the [[Cowled Wizards]] in a time of need. She eventually agreed with Dannihyr's plan only because her position in the council greatly advantaged her businesses.
document_data.Personality: Tyrda was trained by her father to trust only herself and money and to suspect everything.
